title: Shame the boards are so dead right now
body: What happened to creative and interesting league discussion?

replies.body: The boards are slowly growing actually, i've been away and havint been posting as much, but that doesn't mean you cant post content you enjoy, you choose the amount of things you want to see on the boards, and how much you want to contribute to a conversation.
I killed it with my shitposting.

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jmVK6rx8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-15T09:17:40.293+0000)
>
> Do you even post?

http://hownew.ru/
The only person that's probably posted more than me that still uses boards is grandmaster hu. and I bet you don't even know who that is.

You have like 7 posts

EDIT: And your first two were weird, all that Diana stuff

I don't make threads. judging how much someone has posted by their threads is idiotic.
I posted on forums before we had boards. I was there within like the first 2 weeks of the OCE forum starting up.

I'm always on boards :P
Previous username: MastersYiAndMe
I've been typing here for about a year now xD
The boards are starting to slowly expand, it's not dying in anyway dude :P
Yes we are OCE, but it doesn't mean we're not gonna be on boards :P
